wxExStat Class Reference

Adds IsOk to the stat base class, several methods to get/update on the stat members, and Sync to sync the stat from disk. More...

#include <wx/extension/stat.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 wxExStat (const wxString &fullpath=wxEmptyString)
 Default constructor. Calls Sync.
const wxString GetModificationTime () const
 Gets the modification time.
bool IsOk () const
 Returns true if the stat is okay (last update was okay).
bool IsReadOnly () const
 Returns true if this stat is readonly.
bool Sync ()
 Sets (syncs) this stat, returns result and keeps it in IsOk.
bool Sync (const wxString &fullpath)
 Sets the fullpath member, then Syncs.

Detailed Description

Adds IsOk to the stat base class, several methods to get/update on the stat members, and Sync to sync the stat from disk.

Member Function Documentation

const wxString wxExStat::GetModificationTime ( ) const [inline]

Gets the modification time.

From wxFileName class GetModificationTime is available as well, this one returns string and only uses the stat member, and is fast.
